name: The Last Night (itch) (billydotcom)
description:
This is a game that I am currently working on as part of my last year at NAIT.

Sort of an homage to classic slasher and giallo films of the 70s.

You play as a woman who is receiving threatening phonecalls from a mysterious stranger and must avoid the stranger until midnight.

https://github.com/wezragraham/TheLastNight

Now with a demo showing the environment, rudimentary player and enemy interactions.
